summary: An ordinance relating to zoning, and providing for rezoning all of Government Lots 2 and 3, in Section 22, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., lying north of McGilvra Street, as now established, east of a line parallel with and 250 feet west of the west line of Loch Gilvra Addition produced north and west of the east line of 43rd Avenue North, south of McGilvra Street, produced north, and all of Block 23, Lake Washington Shore Lands; with repsect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-24 and 17-19, respectively.
